content: inside so it s not visible because no self respecting wizard boy would be seen in public with a bow tied around his neck  page 5 of 7 copyright sherri bush sherri crochets & crafts http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush contact me at sherricrochets@gmail com putting it all together hair for his hair i used brown fun fur using a smaller hook i joined the fun fur to the back of his head and single_crochet d in single_crochet s around the perimeter of his head sort of like a bald guy who only has a rim of hair remember to make it look like a real head of hair by shaping around where ears would be and give him a forehead from there i filled the area in by single_crochet ing in each single_crochet on his head when his head was full i cut the yarn and weaved it in glasses i used a pipe cleaner to make the glasses somewhere in the center of the pipe cleaner wrap it around something round like your finger or a sharpie a short distance away from this first circle make another circle twist the pipe cleaners so they stay in place put the glasses on his head and measure to see where you ll need to cut off any extra use old scissors or wire cutters if you have them otherwise you can ruin your scissors you can stick the ends of the glasses into a crochet stitch around the ear area page 6 of 7 copyright sherri bush sherri crochets & crafts http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush contact me at sherricrochets@gmail com face with the glasses in place mark where you need to put his eyes then remove the glasses and embroider the face i like to use black four ply yarn divided into 2 strands i make the eyes out of x s sort of like a square i made him smiling but my son said he needs a more severe determined look shoes divide a piece of white yarn into 2 strands using your yarn needle weave the white yarn on top of his shoes to look like shoe laces scarf optional using maroon and yellow start with red chain 4 join to first chain chain 2 make 5 double_crochet in loop slip_stitch to first stitch and switch to yellow and work even double_crochet ing in each double_crochet around without cutting the yarn carry each color up continue to switch between red and yellow until the scarf measures at least 20 rounds or until you think it s long enough tie strands of each color on each end to make fringe page 7 of 7 copyright sherri bush sherri
